results.title: Sure thing
results.creator_credit: Jacquelin Perske, Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Australian Film Commission
results.brief_description: Knowing their aspirations will come true is what separates teenage friends Narelle and Nancy from other dreamers. Together, they are going to make it big as a singer and a writer and get out of their current situation - high school, Melbourne, and move to America. All it takes is money. As the girls slip in and out of fantasy, reality becomes all the more unbearable as their parents try to separate them. Cast includes Louise Fox and Di Adams.

results.title: Surcouf
results.creator_credit: Georges de la Giraudiere and Roy Rowland
results.brief_description:
The first of two films (in our collection) recounting the exploits of famous privateer Robert Surcouf and starring Gerard Barray. On 6 October 1801, in the Sea of Bengal, Surcouf and his crew attack the English vessel ‘Kent’. See also: Le Retour de Surcouf (X000345, 16mm).

Credits: Producer, Georges de la Giraudiere ; director, Roy Rowland ; photography, Juan Gelpi.
Cast: Gerard Barray, Antonella Lualdi, Genevieve Casile, Terrence Morgan.

results.title: Sur mer et sur terre etc.
results.brief_description: Five French language programmes taken in location in and arround Fecamp and Potiers: 1. “Sur mer et sur terre”. 2. “Par les rues”. 3. “Chemin faisant”. 4. “Ecole, travail, familie”. 5. Loisirs”.

results.title: Sur le pont d'Avignon

results.brief_description: Extravagantly gowned marionettes perform the pantomimes in this old French folksong, with vocal interpretations by the Trio Lyrique.

results.title: Supply and drainage ditches
results.creator_credit: CSIRO. Film Unit and J.J. Walker
results.brief_description: Stresses the need for control of irrigation water by the design and construction of ditches capable of handling an adequate flow of water. Describes the design, lay-out and construction of an efficient irrigation system without which fertile land may be ruined by water logging and salting.

results.title: Supply and demand
results.creator_credit: Greenhouse Films, Bruce Stubblefield and Ted Abenheim
results.brief_description: Basic introductory film on the concepts of supply and demand. Defines the law of supply and the law of demand, shows how the equilibrium point between these two laws determines prices, and provides examples of these laws in real life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Greenhouse Films, Bruce Stubblefield and Ted Abenheim

results.title: Supervising: developing co-operation
results.creator_credit: United States. Dept. of the Navy and Caravel Films
results.brief_description: Points out that the efficiency of an organisation depends on the morale of its personnel and then shows how office supervisors can help to foster a spirit of cooperation among civilian personnel. Right and wrong ways of supervision are demonstrated.
results.creator_credit_for_label: United States. Dept. of the Navy and Caravel Films

results.title: Supervise with care: three studies in worker supervision
results.brief_description: Describes three studies in worker supervision: expert workers who become annoyed when a supervisor takes notes of details without explanation; proper distribution of work among seniors and juniors brought about by discussion between supervisors and seniors; in placing junior workers, supervisors should consider their abilities.
